Text: bit of a n00b question here but; how do i get this type of file to play?

@Eirik_gamer -- The easiest way is to use a program such as IMGBurn to burn it to a DVD and play it normally ;)

Otherwise you can try using Daemon Tools  to mount the image and then play it on your PC like that.

I can rip to mp4+aac in +2 days, and mp3+xvid in $+3
with ffmpeg, i get _far_ better quality doing dvd->mp4->xvid then merging
